alert.note: Alert for Sheridan Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 22 at 3:34PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Big Horn, southwestern Powder River, southern Rosebud and northeastern Sheridan Counties through 400 PM MDT... At 333 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lame Deer to 8 miles southwest of Ashland to 28 miles west of Spotted Horse. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Colstrip, Lame Deer, Ashland, Otter, Birney Village and Northern Cheyenne Indian Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
